nodes.text: The TranLang III communication module, also known as the TranLang III communications package, was a droid component used for communication. Protocol droid models such as the 3PO-series protocol droid had the TranLang III module installed.

The Tranlang could allow a protocol droid to speak six to seven million forms of communication. By the time of the First Order- Resistance War, C-3PO had upgraded his TranLang III communications packet to increase his language fluency to over seven million forms of communication. C-3PO once tried to speak to the Tauntaun Murra with a loud, grating squawk but was unsuccessful.
